snippet: With Republicans controlling all branches of the state government for the first time in more than a century, the legislature pushed through a range of conservative change.
abstract: North Carolinians across the political spectrum are worried that the state's often-hailed political pragmatism may have given way to ideological warfare of Washington politics; with Republicans controlling all branches of state government for the first time in more than a century, legislature has pushed through a wide range of conservative change.
lead_paragraph: With Republicans controlling all branches of the state government for the first time in more than a century, the legislature pushed through a range of conservative change.

headline.main: North Carolinians Fear the End of a Middle Way
headline.print_headline: North Carolinians Fear the End of a Middle Way

keywords.value: National Assn for the Advancement of Colored People
